title: Pokémon Go Developer Niantic to Develop ‘Harry Potter Go’?
subtitle: A rumor that the company that created Pokémon Go was launching a Harry Potter-themed version of the game was a hoax in 2014, but reality in 2017.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Pokémon Go developer Niantic is working on a Harry Potter version of the hugely popular augmented-reality game.
